articles.title: Will Bitcoin and Ethereum prices stagnate, sink or rebound in 2023?
articles.description: We're taking a look at how significant crypto and global events from this year affected the two biggest cryptocurrencies: Bitcion and Ether.
articles.content: Thanks to a months-long shakeout, the crypto market experienced one of the most drastic drawdowns in its history in 2022. But questions are arising about when (if?) major cryptocurrencies will recove… [+1320 chars]

articles.title: India to explore prohibition of unbacked crypto in its G20 presidency

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: D&D will change to defend against crypto, other forms of exploitation
articles.description: One D&D will launch with a new licensing agreement in 2023 designed to deal with modern issues like crypto and crowdfunding. But what does that mean for creators on Etsy, for instance, or your favorite actual play series on Twitch?
articles.content: Wizards of the Coast will publish a new licensing agreement for the next iteration of Dungeons & Dragons, called One D&D, in early 2023. This new framework will only cover written materials, … [+5414 chars]
